item.title: Samba share windows
item.description: Setup samba on ubuntu linux https://adrianmejia.com/how-to-set-up-samba-in-ubuntu-linux-and-access-it-in-mac-os-and-windows/ apt install samba cifs-utils lalu edit /etc/samba/smb.conf systemctl restart smbd test via windows, dengan mengakses \ip.atau.hostname.server
